## Description
Describe the security concern clearly.

## Affected Area
Which part of the project is impacted?

## Potential Impact
What could happen if this issue is not fixed?

## Suggested Mitigation (Optional)
If you have ideas to fix it, mention them.

## Additional Notes
Any references or external resources.
